title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor sizing issue in property sheet
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor in column two of the property sheet does not size correctly when any of the strings in the drop-down list are wider than the width of the property sheet column. As a result, the drop-down button may be pushed off the visible area of the property sheet and gets clipped.
EB: The ComboBoxCellEditor should size itself to fit within the width of the property sheet column and ensure that the drop-down button remains visible at all times.
SR:
To reproduce: 

1. Open the PropertySheetViewer and navigate to a page where ComboBoxCellEditor is used in column two.

2. Make sure one of the strings in the drop-down list is wider than the width of the property sheet column.

3. Observe that the drop-down button of the ComboBoxCellEditor is pushed off the visible area and gets clipped.
